name: 3D Dot Game Heroes PoC
description:
This project was made for a videogame course in FIB (Facultat Informàtica de Barcelona)

The main objective of the game is to get to the final boss of the dungeon and defeat it, just like any other dungeon in Zelda-like games. You need the special weapon of the dungeon in order to progress and defeat the boss.

Tip: When the boss is glowing, only magic can affect him ;)

Controls:

Move player - WASD

Attack - Space Bar

Change weapon - R

Interact - E

06/01/2023

Windows version uploaded. WebGL version may be uploaded in the future.
